## goup-util utm push

Push a file from local machine to the VM

### Synopsis

Push a file from local machine to the VM.

Examples:
  # Push config file
  goup-util utm push "Windows 11" ./config.json "C:\\Users\\User\\config.json"

  # Push test data
  goup-util utm push "Windows 11" ./test-data.zip "/tmp/test-data.zip"

```
goup-util utm push <vm-name> <local-path> <remote-path> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for push
```
